data.text: @DaveBlass I don't know why you appear on my homepage. Fortunately, we may have common friends or hobbies. Maybe you can add me as a good friend and let us get to know each other. Anyway, I sincerely wish you all the best
@DaveBlass I refuse to believe that from your tweets alone it shows how much you care about trek so they better give you a new project or we protest 😅 https://t.co/FJSRcCfxj5

@DaveBlass @ajarvis_art That reel is amazing. Now I'm wondering: these floating transparent interfaces, were they designed after filming, to match the actors' movements? Or were the movements choreographed before shooting, to match the interface designs?
@DaveBlass As much as I dislike the scripts and story direction, the show always looks fantastic. These are the people who make a TV show look like a movie.
@DaveBlass @ajarvis_art I â€¦ was wondering! Happy to see the connection is not recently ended.

@DaveBlass @ajarvis_art I love all the interfaces so much! I'm currently rewatching season 1 and I keep pausing and staring at all the stunning designs.
I can't wait to see what you've come up with for season 2!
@DaveBlass :) Me: goes back to writing. "There's always hope."
